description.value: The Flickerflame ignores the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} condition from smoke.
Allies within 5 feet of a Flickerflame gain a +1 circumstance bonus on Crafting or Recall Knowledge checks.
The Flickerflame sheds light as a candle, casting low light out to 15 feet away.
